## Voice.addEventListener() method

Call invite rejected event. Raised when a pending incoming call invite has been rejected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEventListener(callInviteRejectedEvent: Voice.Event.CallInviteRejected, listener: Voice.Listener.CallInviteRejected): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callInviteRejectedEvent | [Voice.Event.CallInviteRejected](./voice-react-native-sdk.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [Voice.Listener.CallInviteRejected](./voice-react-native-sdk.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.callinviterejected_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The call object.

## Remarks

This event is raised when call invites are rejected outside of the SDK, i.e. through the native iOS or Android UI.

## Example


```typescript
voice.addEventListener(Voice.Event.CallInviteRejected, (callInvite: CallInvite) => {
  // handle the rejection of the incoming call invite
});
```
